title: A selection of first sentences from new books, Oct. 25
text: A selection of first sentences from new books, Oct. 25 Thursday, 22 October 2015 (9 minutes ago) Los Angeles Police Det. John Skaggs carried the shoebox aloft like a waiter bearing a platter. “Ghettoside: A True Story of Murder in America,” now in paperback, by Jill Leovy It mattered to him that he woke up alone. “The Pathless Sky,” a novel by Chaitali Sen I am an artist first, a censor second. “The Tsar of Love and Techno,” stories by Anthony Marra When I was nine, I wrote a vow of celibacy on a piece of paper and ate it. “Not That Kind of Girl,” now in paperback, by Lena Dunham A FORMER Special Forces soldier from Forest Row is putting civilians through "the world's toughest job interview" on a new TV show designed to recreate the... East Grinstead Courier Observer 15 hours ago - UK Carlton have broken new ground by trading the future draft pick they received for Lachie Henderson for pick eight in this year's draft.
